results.name: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0) = T(n,2n) = 1 for n >= 0, T(n,1)=0 for n >= 1, T(n,2)=1 for n >= 2 and for n >= 3, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-3) + T(n-1, k-2) + T(n-1,k-1) for 3 <= k <= 2n-1. T(n,k)=0 for k < 0 or k > 2n.
comment: The following sequences all have the same parity: A004737, A006590, A027052, A071028, A071797, A078358, A078446. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Mar 16 2003
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of triangle, flattened
formula: A001590(k+1) = T(n,k) if 0 <= k <= n. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 01 2014
maple: if k=0 or k=2 or k=2*n then 1

if (k==0 or k==2 or k==2*n): return 1
else: return sum(T(n-1, k-j) for j in (1..3))
[[T(n, k) for k in (0..2*n)] for n in (0..10)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 05 2019
if k=0 or k=2 or k=2*n then return 1;
else return Sum([1..3], j-> T(n-1, k-j) );
